articles.author: Hannah Murphy, Cristina Criddle
articles.title: Elon Musk's X Corp sues anti-hate speech group over Twitter claims - Financial Times
articles.description: Legal challenge to Center for Countering Digital Hate comes as social media network rapidly loses advertising income
articles.content:
Elon Musks X Corp is suing the Center for Countering Digital Hate over suggestions there has been a rise in hate speech and disinformation on Twitter since the entrepreneur took over the platform.

articles.title: Gallium and germanium: What China's new move in microchip war means for world - BBC
articles.description: The world's second largest economy is putting controls on gallium and germanium exports.
articles.content:
China is due to start restricting exports of two materials key to the semiconductor industry, as the chip war with the US heats up.
